se350.afifsohaili.sudoku

Class SudokuGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • se350.afifsohaili.gameframework.Grid<SudokuData>
      • se350.afifsohaili.sudoku.SudokuGrid

  • public class SudokuGrid
extends Grid<SudokuData>
    The class extends the abstract class GridData and contains the data that is used in a Sudoku game: basically, an integer.
    Author:
    Afif Sohaili
